# 队列的实现

function Queue() {
	this.list = []
}

Queue.prototype = {
	constructor: Queue,

	// 入队
	enqueue: function(element) {
		this.list.push(element)
	},

	// 出队
	dequeue: function() {
		this.list.shift()
	},

	// 长度
	size: function() {
		return this.list.length
	},

	// 取队首元素，但不删除
	front: function() {
		return this.size() > 0 ? this.list[0] : undefined
	},

	// 取队尾元素，但不删除
	back: function() {
		return this.size() > 0 ? this.list[this.list.length - 1] : undefined
	},

	// 判断是否为空
	empty: function() {
		return !!this.list.length
	},

	// 清除队列
	clear: function() {
		this.list = []
	},

	toString: function() {
		var str = ''
		for (var i = 0, len = this.size(); i < len; i++) {
			str += this.list[i].toString()
		}
		return str
	}
}
